strong.span: All Oklahoma Public Schools Are Closed Through The End Of The 2019-2020 School Year

p.span: At this time, all schools and offices are not scheduled to reopen until the 2020-2021 school year begins
We will be working on plans for PreK Roundup, Central Enrollment, & more - those will be communicated ASAP.
You may contact us by
in the event of an urgent need or emergency, and we will respond as soon as possible.

div.h3: Empowering Today to Achieve a Better Tomorrow

span.style: font-size: 18pt; font-family: Oswald, sans-serif; color: #494949; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 14pt; font-family: Oswald, sans-serif; color: #494949; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

h3.span: Oklahoma Schools To Remain Closed, Offer Continuous Learning

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: (March 25, 2020) - As districts around the state and across the country continue to grapple with how to proceed in this unprecedented challenge to public health and education, the Mustang School District supports the nation’s need to flatten the curve of the COVID-19 pandemic.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: This morning, following critical guidance from the CDC, the State Board of Education voted to approve

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: a Continuous Learning Plan that directs all Oklahoma public schools to complete the school year for Oklahoma students without reopening school buildings.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: This means that the remainder of the school year in the Mustang Public Schools (MPS) will not occur in a traditional school environment that brings large numbers of students and staff together in one location.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: As such, MPS will extend its districtwide closure for the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: At this time, all schools and offices are not scheduled to reopen until the 2020-2021 school year begins.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Beginning April 6, districts will be expected to provide distance learning for the remainder of the school year. The Oklahoma State Department of Education (OSDE) has formed a Distance Learning Team that will guide us by providing a framework of expectations. This is a difficult situation and we appreciate your patience as we navigate it together. We are confident that our team will have a quality continuous learning plan established for our students within the next two weeks. In the meantime, communication will be a top priority.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We will continue to follow the guidance of local/state/national health and education leaders as we move forward. For additional information, please visit one of the following:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;color:mediumblue
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;color:mediumblue
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Communications from MPS, Information, Updates, Links/Resources

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;color:mediumblue
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Commonly Asked Questions, Informational Resources

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;text-decoration:underline;color:mediumblue
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Links to Elementary, Intermediate, Middle, & High School Plans

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Though school buildings are closed, unique learning opportunities are being designed and once complete will be implemented to ensure continuous learning for each student for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We are navigating uncharted waters, and we are so proud of how everyone is stepping up to meet the challenge To conclude, we would ask that you

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: to view a message from Superintendent Bradley.

span.style: font-size: 18pt; font-family: Oswald, sans-serif; color: #494949; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 14pt; font-family: Oswald, sans-serif; color: #494949; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

h3.span: Working Closely With State/Local Health Partners

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: (March 6, 2020) - Given the evolving situation, Mustang Public Schools is working with our local and state health partners as we closely monitor the

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #494949; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #494949; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

br.span: As you may already be aware, the first case of

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #0000ff; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #1155cc; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

br.span: . Naturally, it is normal to be concerned when we hear about health-related events like this. Please be assured that the health and safety of students and staff is always a priority.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Oswald, sans-serif; color: #494949; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Mustang Public Schools is Proactive

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: At Mustang Public Schools, we have a comprehensive cleaning service on contract so that facilities can be biologically treated. Our staff uses a hospital grade disinfectant which

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #222222; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: is effective against viruses such as COVID-19. The Teachers and other staff that have students in their rooms have a daily procedure to disinfect areas

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . In addition, we lay floor finish that has Microban Antimicrobial Protection Technology that inhibits the growth of microbes, therefore, allowing another way for the school district to prevent the spread of illness.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The continuation of the programs in place: hand hygiene, disinfecting, and Microban Technology will continue to provide Mustang Public Schools with a clean, safe, and healthy environment for the students and staff.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: In the event of an outbreak in our community, we would follow our public health partners’ lead. As always, our focus is to ensure the safety of all students and staff, and continue education with minimal disruption.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: Oswald, sans-serif; color: #494949; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: What Can You Do?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) offer these tips to prevent influenza and other respiratory viruses:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Get vaccinated annually for the flu

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. If soap and water are not available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Avoid close contact with sick people

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Stay at home if you are experiencing flu-like symptoms

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue, then throw the tissue in the trash. Sleeves are a secondary option, but close proximity to the elbow is required.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Individuals with chronic health issues and/or individuals experiencing severe symptoms should be evaluated by a medical professional.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The CDC recommends that individuals remain home for at least 24 hours after you no longer have a fever or signs of a fever (i.e., chills, feeling warm, flushed appearance).

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: These are

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: #1155cc; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: that can help prevent the spread of several viruses.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We appreciate your partnership in supporting the health and safety of our school communities. Thank you for entrusting the care of your child/ren with us. We take our responsibility very seriously, and assure you that we will continue to monitor this topic. As always, thank you for your continued support.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
